2065670.name: Pimp My Cruise
2065670.description:
Pimp My Cruise is a hardly serious game about building multi-deck extravaganzas!

Buy, Renovate, Sell, Repeat.

  • Design cruise ships based on your client's specification.
  • Build ships for Rapper, Mayor, Businessman, Oligarch, Nature-lover and more!
  • Make sure the cruise ship is weight-balanced and fits within operational limits!

Features


  • Soft fixing - cleaning, collecting trash (a mop, a trashcan) - FPP
  • Hard fixing - vessel repairs, engine repairs (a hammer, a screwdriver, a wrench) - FPP
  • Decoration - Decorating ships - like The Sims, House Flipper, Builder SImulator etc.

Limitations

  • Bouyancy
  • Load Displacement
  • Energy consumption
  • Fame
  • Money

Don't forget to have fun!
2065670.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
